Event ID: 001
Event Name: Trainer(5)
(X,Y): (005,013)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_ROCKETADEPT_M

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:ROCKETADEPT_M)
@>Script: pbNoticePlayer(get_character(0))
@>Text: \bHow'd you get up here?
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:ROCKETADEPT_M,"Cole",_I("Unexpected."))
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbTrainerEnd
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 030
Event Name: EV030
(X,Y): (000,000)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Parallel Process

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == OFF
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map Y
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0004: Temp Move Name] == 9
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 10
   @>Comment: Is on switch.
   @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
   @>Play SE: 'Voltorb Flip explosion', 80, 100
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(27, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(28, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(29, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(26, "B", true)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map Y
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0004: Temp Move Name] != 9
  @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(27, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(28, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(29, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(26, "B", false)
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] != 10
   @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(27, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(28, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(29, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(26, "B", false)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 031
Event Name: pad1
(X,Y): (015,015)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] == 0
 @>Play SE: 'stat_upz', 80, 100
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Transfer Player:[002: 6F Silph Co], (006,010), Right, No Fade
 @>Control Variables: [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] += 1
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] == 1
  @>Play SE: 'stat_upz', 80, 100
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[002: 6F Silph Co], (006,015), Down, No Fade
  @>Control Variables: [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] += 1
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] == 2
   @>Play SE: 'stat_upz', 80, 100
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
   @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
   @>Transfer Player:[002: 6F Silph Co], (006,005), Left, No Fade
   @>Control Variables: [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] += 1
   @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] == 3
    @>Play SE: 'stat_upz', 80, 100
    @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
    @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
    @>Transfer Player:[002: 6F Silph Co], (021,016), Right, No Fade
    @>Control Variables: [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] += 1
    @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] == 4
     @>Play SE: 'stat_upz', 80, 100
     @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
     @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
     @>Transfer Player:[002: 6F Silph Co], (015,015), Left, No Fade
     @>Control Variables: [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] = 0
     @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6

@>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.numbadges>=1
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       : :POKEBALL,:GREATBALL,
 :       : :POTION,:SUPERPOTION,
 :       : :ANTIDOTE,:PARALYZEHEAL,
 :       : :AWAKENING,:BURNHEAL,
 :       : :ICEHEAL,:ESCAPEROPE,
 :       : :REPEL
 :       : ])
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbPokemonMart([
:       : :POKEBALL,
:       : :POTION,
:       : :ANTIDOTE
:       : ])
@>

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0

Event ID: 067
Event Name: Coin seller
(X,Y): (019,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \G\CN\bWelcome to Rocket Game Corner!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: !$PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:COINCASE)
 @>Text: \G\CN\bDo you need some game coins?\nWould you 
  :    : like to buy some?
 @>Text: \G\CN\bYou don't have a Coin Case.
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start menu
 @>Text: \G\CN\bDo you need some game coins?\nWould you 
  :    : like to buy some?
 @>Show Choices: 50 coins [$500], 500 coins [$5,000], Exit
 (When Cancel: Choice 3)
 : When [50 coins [$500]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.coins + 50 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\bWhoops!\nYour Coin Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 499 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\bYou can't afford the coins.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 500
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins += 50
    @>Text: \G\CN\bThank you\nHere are your coins!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [500 coins [$5,000]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.coins + 500 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\bWhoops!\nYour Coin Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 4999 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\bYou can't afford the coins.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 5000
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins += 500
    @>Text: \G\CN\bThank you\nHere are your coins!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Exit]
  @>Text: \G\CN\bNo?\nPlease come play sometime!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Jump to Label: Start menu
@>

Event ID: 009
Event Name: rival
(X,Y): (015,015)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar005

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
@>Play BGM: 'RivalTheme', 100, 100
@>Show Animation: This event, [Exclaim bubble]
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Oh hey!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]How's your adventure coming along?
@>Show Animation: This event, [Happy Emote]
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I need to battle you.\nI've got some new 
 :    : Pokémon I've been training with 
 :    : hard, and I've wanted to battle you for a while now.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I'm really pumped to get my 8th badge 
 :    : and challenge the Pokémon League.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I know I can do it.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Alright so are you ready?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Do you want me to heal your Pokémon first?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,"Brett",_I("No!"),false,5,true,34)
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Thinking Emote]
  @>Text: \xn[Brett]...\wt[8] I can't believe I lost...\wt[8] again!
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Angry Emote]
  @>Text: \xn[Brett]You're such a strong trainer, I just
   :    : can't beat you.
  @>Text: \xn[Brett]Guess I'll keep training, see you later.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @20
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
  @>
 : Else
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Thinking Emote]
  @>Text: \xn[Brett]I won?\nI don't appreciate you taking it easy 
   :    : on me just because I wanted to win.
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Angry Emote]
  @>Text: \xn[Brett]Hmph, we're not done.
   :    : I'll see you again soon.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @20
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
 @>Play BGM: 'soulcity', 100, 100
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(5,"A",true)
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Show Animation: This event, [Thinking Emote]
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Alright come back when you are then, 
  :    : I'll wait for you.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF

  @>
 : Branch End

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 005
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (023,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.

  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 003
Event Name: Triple Triad explainer
(X,Y): (010,033)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 08

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm here to explain the rules of Triple Triad.
@>Label: Choices
@>Text: \rWhich topic do you want to learn about?
@>Show Choices: Basics, Game rules, Prizes, Exit
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Basics]
 @>Text: \rTriple Triad is a game played with special square 
  :    : cards placed on a 3x3 board.
 @>Text: \rEach card has 4 numbers on it, one per side.  
  :    : These numbers are so-called stats.
 @>Text: \rPlayers take turns placing cards on the board. As 
  :    : they do so, they try to capture and gain control of 
  :    : their opponent's cards.
 @>Text: \rThat's where the numbers come in. If a player 
  :    : places a card with a higher number next to a card 
  :    : with a lower number, the player captures that card.
 @>Text: \rThus, the goal of the game is to gain control of more 
  :    : cards than the other player by the end of the game.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Game rules]
 @>Text: \rThere are a number of optional game rules you can 
  :    : apply to individual games.
 @>Text: \rThey can affect card stats, how cards capture 
  :    : each other, the scoring and the prizes.
 @>Show Choices: Count Hand, Elements, Same Number, Grid Wrap
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Count Hand]
  @>Text: \rCount Hand rules count the unplayed cards in a player's hand as points.
  @>
 : When [Elements]
  @>Text: \rEach space on the board is assigned a random type.
   :    : If a card is placed on a space with the same type,
   :    : it gains +1 to all its values (values can even go beyond "A" because of this).
   :    : This bonus only applies to a newly-played card attempting to capture other cards; 
  @>Text: \rthe bonus is removed afterwards
  @>
 : When [Same Number]
  @>Text: \rCards are also captured if their touching number is 
   :    : equal to the newly-played card's number, 
   :    : as well as if it is less than the newly-played card's number. 
   :    : Also, the captured cards then immediately attempt to capture any cards touching them.
  @>
 : When [Grid Wrap]
  @>Text: \rThe board wraps around on itself in all directions, so there are no edges. 
   :    : For example, the top of a card played in the top centre spot will touch the
   :    :  bottom of a card in the bottom centre spot, and may capture it.
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Prizes]
 @>Text: \rWhen you win a game, you will recive 1 random 
  :    : card from your opponent from their Deck.
 @>Text: \rThis also works the other way around: if you lose, 
  :    : you have to give your opponent one of your cards, 
  :    : chosen at random.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Exit]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

(X,Y): (012,034)

Conditions

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:

@>Text: \bWelcome to the Triad Card Shop.
@>Label: Choices
@>Show Choices: Buy Cards, Sell Cards, Buy Boosterpack, Exit
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Buy Cards]
 @>Script: pbBuyTriads
 @>Text: \bAnything else I can do for you?
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Sell Cards]
 @>Script: pbSellTriads
 @>Text: \bAnything else I can do for you?
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Buy Boosterpack]
 @>Label: Choices
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       : :BOOSTERPACK,:DARKPACK,:HEARTPACK,
 :       : :PLAINPACK,:DRAGONPACK,
 :       : :FISTPACK,:FROSTPACK,
 :       : :WINGPACK,:MINDPACK,
 :       : :TOXICPACK,:VOLTPACK,
 :       : :EARTHPACK,:LEAFPACK,
 :       : :BOULDERPACK,:AQUAPACK,
 :       : :BUZZPACK,:SEARPACK,
 :       : :SPOOKYPACK,:METALPACK
 :       : ])
 @>
: When [Exit]
 @>Text: \bPlease come again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 005
Event Name: Triple Triad explainer
(X,Y): (010,032)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm here to explain the rules of Triple Triad.
@>Label: Choices
@>Text: \rWhich topic do you want to learn about?
@>Show Choices: Basics, Game rules, Prizes, Exit
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Basics]
 @>Text: \rTriple Triad is a game played with special square 
  :    : cards placed on a 3x3 board.
 @>Text: \rEach card has 4 numbers on it, one per side.  
  :    : These numbers are so-called stats.
 @>Text: \rPlayers take turns placing cards on the board. As 
  :    : they do so, they try to capture and gain control of 
  :    : their opponent's cards.
 @>Text: \rThat's where the numbers come in. If a player 
  :    : places a card with a higher number next to a card 
  :    : with a lower number, the player captures that card.
 @>Text: \rThus, the goal of the game is to gain control of more 
  :    : cards than the other player by the end of the game.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Game rules]
 @>Text: \rThere are a number of optional game rules you can 
  :    : apply to individual games.
 @>Text: \rThey can affect card stats, how cards capture 
  :    : each other, the scoring and the prizes.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Prizes]
 @>Text: \rWhen you win a game, you will recive 1 random 
  :    : card from your opponent from their Deck.
 @>Text: \rThis also works the other way around: if you lose, 
  :    : you have to give your opponent one of your cards, 
  :    : chosen at random.
 @>Text: \rYou can change what you win or lose from a game 
  :    : by using an optional game rule.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Exit]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 006
Event Name: Triple Triad duel with prize
(X,Y): (011,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar031

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \l[3]\bI'll play you in a match with card staking!
 :    : (Random Opponent Cards)\n
 :    : (Elements, Count Hand, Same Number)
@>Show Choices: Duel, No Thanks
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Duel]
 @>Text: Select Minimum Difficulty\n(EASY 0 - - - 9 HARD)
 @>Input Number: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice], 1 digit(s)
 @>Text: Select Maximum Difficulty\n(EASY 0 - - - 9 HARD)
 @>Input Number: [0002: Temp Move Choice], 1 digit(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] > Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice]
  @>Text: Minimum can't be higher than maximum, try again.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: mindiff = pbGet(1)
 :       : maxdiff = pbGet(2)
 :       : if pbTriadDuel("Ryan",mindiff,maxdiff,["countunplayed","samewins","elements"])==1
 :       :  $game_variables[1]=1
 :       : else
 :       :  $game_variables[1]=0
 :       : end
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
  @>Comment: Win
  @>Text: \bDarn, you played well, enjoy the card.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Comment: Lose or Draw
  @>Text: \bIt was close, better luck next time.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No Thanks]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Counter(4)
(X,Y): (012,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This event can notice the player at a distance even 
 :       : though an impassable tile (the desk) is in the way. 
 :       : This is because this event's name contains the text 
 :       : "Counter(X)", where "X" is the number of tiles in front 
 :       : of itself that it can see.
@>Text: \bWelcome to the Safari Zone!
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \G\bFor just $1500, you can play the Safari Game.
@>Text: \G\bYou can roam the wide-open safari and catch 
 :    : what you like.
@>Text: \G\bWould you like to play?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbBoxesFull?
  @>Text: \G\bSorry, your PC boxes are full.
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 1499 or less
  @>Text: \G\bOops!\nNot enough money!
  @>Text: \G\bCome again.
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Change Gold: - 1500
  @>Text: \G\bThat'll be $1500, please!
  @>Text: \G\bWe only use a special kind of Poké Ball here.
  @>Text: \G\PN received 30 Safari Balls from the attendant.
   :    : \me[Item get]\wtnp[40]
  @>Text: \G\bWe'll call you on the PA when you run out of time 
   :    : or Safari Balls.
  @>Text: \G\bWell, I'll wish you the best of luck!
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_player.x == 8
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Up
    :              : $>Move Up
    :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_player.x == 10
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
    @>
   : Else
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Turn Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Script: pbSafariState.pbStart(30)
  @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
  @>Transfer Player:[022: Safari], (026,029), No Fade
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \G\bOkay.\nPlease come again!
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Move Down
 @>
: Branch End
@>

   :              : $>Move Down

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 003
Event Name: Move Relearner
(X,Y): (013,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 31

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: isTempSwitchOff?("A")
 @>Text: \bI'm the Pokémon Move Maniac.
 @>Text: \bIf you bring me a <b>HEARTSCALES</b> I can 
  :    : teach your Pokémon a move.
 @>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:HEARTSCALE)
 @>Text: \bYou've got a <b>HEARTSCALE</b> would you like 
  :    : to use it to learn a move?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon needs tutoring?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3, proc{ |pkmn|
  :       :   pkmn.can_relearn_move?
  :       :   }, true
  :       : )
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbGetPokemon(1).can_relearn_move?
   @>Text: \bSorry...
   @>Text: \bIt doesn't appear as if I have any move I can teach 
    :    : to your \v[3].
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
   :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
    :    : with a Heart Scale.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
    @>Text: \bHunh? There isn't a single move that I can teach an 
     :    : Egg.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
    @>Text: \bNo way, I don't want to go near a Shadow 
     :    : Pokémon..
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \bWhich move should I teach to your \v[3]?
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRelearnMoveScreen(pbGetPokemon(1))
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:HEARTSCALE)
    @>Text: \PN handed over one Heart Scale in exchange.
    @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
     :    : with a Heart Scale.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
     :    : with a Heart Scale.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
   :    : with a Heart Scale.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
  :    : with a Heart Scale.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Options Enabled
Move Animation

@>Text: \bI can help your Pokémon forget moves.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: ChoosePokemon
 @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon should forget a move?
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
   :    : forgotten.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
   @>Text: \bWhat? No Egg should know any moves.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).isShadow? rescue false)
   @>Text: \bWhat? I can't make a Shadow Pokémon forget a 
    :    : move.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).numMoves==1
   @>Text: \b\v[3] seems to know only one move...
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \bWhich move should be forgotten?
  @>Script: pbChooseMove(pbGetPokemon(1),2,4)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 0
   @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \bHm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Play ME: '013-Gag02', 100, 100
    @>Wait: 80 frame(s)
    @>Script: pbGetPokemon(1).pbDeleteMoveAtIndex(
    :       :    pbGet(2))
    @>Text: \bIt worked to perfection!
    @>Text: \b\v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
     :    : forgotten.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
  :    : forgotten.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Name Rater
(X,Y): (001,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 17

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bWant me to rate the nicknames of your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon's nickname should I critique?
 @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon. The index 
  :       : is stored in Game Variable 1, and the name in Game 
  :       : Variable 3.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3)
 @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
  :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for eggs.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
  @>Text: \bNow, now... That is merely an Egg!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
  @>Text: \bI wouldn't dare critique a Shadow Pokémon's name!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).foreign?($Trainer)
  @>Text: \bHmmm... \v[3] it is!
  @>Text: \bThis is a magnificent nickname! It is impeccably 
   :    : beyond reproach!
  @>Text: \bYou'll do well to cherish your \v[3] now and 
   :    : beyond.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \b\v[3], is it?\nThat is a decent nickname!
 @>Text: \bBut, would you like me to give it a nicer name?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \bAh, good. Then, what shall the new nickname be?
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : species = pkmn.speciesName
  :       : pbSet(4, species)
  :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",
  :       :   0, Pokemon::MAX_NAME_SIZE, 5)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == pbGet(3) || (pbGet(5) == "" && pbGet(3) == pbGet(4))
   @>Comment: The Pokémon's nickname wasn't changed.
   @>Text: \bI see. You're right, there's no need to change this 
    :    : Pokémon's nickname.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == "" || pbGet(5) == pbGet(4)
    @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
    @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.name = nil
    :       : pbSet(3, pkmn.name)
    @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
     :    : as \v[3]!
    @>
   : Else
    @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon whose party index is stored in 
     :       : Game Variable 1, and changes its name to the name 
     :       : stored in Game Variable 5.
    @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.name = pbGet(5)
    @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
     :    : as \v[5]!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Show Choices: Fresh Water - $400, Coffee - $375, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 3)
 : When [Fresh Water - $400]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 400 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Change Gold: - 400
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Text: \GA Fresh Water dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...20)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Fresh Water dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Coffee - $375]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 375 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:COFFEE)
    @>Change Gold: - 375
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:COFFEE)
    @>Text: \GA Coffee dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...20)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:COFFEE)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:COFFEE)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Coffee dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 20

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Switches: [0167: Victory Plateau] = ON
@>Text: \xn[Conductor]Welcome to the Onix Express!
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == OFF
 @>Text: \xn[Conductor]Onix can transport you to any
  :    : destination you've been to before instantly!
 @>Text: \xn[Conductor]Make sure to speak to the 
  :    : Conductors in each town you visit!
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: a
@>Text: \xn[Conductor]Where would you like to go?\ch[1,9,Seafoam City, Bouldergrove, Anthrophil, Emberton, Saltstone Villa, Neon City, Glacier City, Soul City, Fortune City, 
 :    : Victory Plateau]
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
 @>Text: So, you want to go to Seafoam City?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0159: Seafoam] == ON
   @>Text: Have a safe trip!
   @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:ONIX)
   @>Transfer Player:[048: Seafoam City], (036,010), Down
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Oh, you haven't been there before.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: a
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 8
 @>Text: So, you want to go to Fortune City?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0166: Fortune] == ON
   @>Text: Have a safe trip!
   @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:ONIX)
   @>Transfer Player:[197: Fortune City], (046,021), Down
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Oh, you haven't been there before.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: a
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Hall of Fame autorun
(X,Y): (002,013)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Switches: [0012: Defeated Elite Four] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0013: E4 defeated count] += 1
@>Wait: 16 frame(s)
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Script: pbHallOfFameEntry
@>Script: $scene = Scene_Credits.new
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Script: $Trainer.pokemon_party.each do |pkmn|
:       :   pkmn.giveRibbon(:CHAMPION)
:       : end
@>Transfer Player:[012: Victory Plateau], (016,013), Down, No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

Options Enabled

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Gives 1 random Apricorn each time.
@>Comment: For demonstration purposes only - Apricorn trees 
 :       : should provide a fixed Apricorn, have a 24 hour delay 
 :       : (like Kurt does), and should look different to 
 :       : Headbutt trees.
@>Script: apricorns = [
:       :   :REDAPRICORN,
:       :   :YELLOWAPRICORN,
:       :   :BLUEAPRICORN,
:       :   :GREENAPRICORN,
:       :   :PINKAPRICORN,
:       :   :WHITEAPRICORN,
:       :   :BLACKAPRICORN
:       : ]
@>Script: random_item = apricorns.sample
:       : pbItemBall(random_item)
@>Script: pbSetEventTime
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 007
Event Name: blockergirl
(X,Y): (021,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar006

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0060: Starter Picked] == OFF
 @>Show Animation: [blockergirl], [Exclaim bubble]
 @>Set Move Route: [blockergirl]
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Turn Up
 @>Text: \rHey!\nYou can't go in there without a Pokémon, it isn't safe!
 @>Set Move Route: [blockergirl]
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: Brett] < 1
  @>Show Animation: [blockergirl], [Exclaim bubble]
  @>Set Move Route: [blockergirl]
                    (Ignore If Can't Move)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Move Left
   :              : $>Move Left
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>1 Step Backward
   :              : $>Turn Up
  @>Text: \rThis area's not safe for beginners, come back when you've won a battle.
  @>Set Move Route: [blockergirl]
                    (Ignore If Can't Move)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Move Right
   :              : $>Move Right
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Text formatting NPC
(X,Y): (053,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Start
@>Text: Choose a text option.
@>Show Choices: Colour and formatting, Showing extra things, Other, Cancel
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Colour and formatting]
 @>Text: \bThis is the text of a male character.
  :    : \rThis is the text of a female character.
 @>Text: \pgThis text is the colour of the player's gender. 
  :    : \pogThis text is the colour of the opposite gender to 
  :    : the player.
 @>Text: \c[0]Default, \c[1]blue, \c[2]red, \c[3]green, \c[4]cyan, 
  :    : \c[5]magenta, \c[6]yellow, \c[7]grey, \c[8]white, 
  :    : \c[9]purple, \c[10]orange, \c[11]dark, \c[12]light.
 @>Text: <b>Bold text,</b> <i>italic text,</i> <u>underlined 
  :    : text,</u> <s>strikethrough text,</s> <outln>outline 
  :    : text,</outln> <outln2>thicker outline text.</outln2>
 @>Text: <fn=Power Clear Bold>Power Clear Bold text,</fn> 
  :    : <fs=25>size 25 text,</fs> <fs=40>size 40 text,</fs> 
  :    : <o=128>half-transparent text.</o>
 @>Text: This is a line\n break. Text is \n<r>right-aligned until 
  :    : next line\n break. Text is <ac>centred</ac> here. 
  :    : Text is <ar>right-aligned</ar> here.
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Showing extra things]
 @>Text: \PN is the player's name, \PM is the player's money, 
  :    : \v[12] is the content of Game Variable 12.
 @>Text: \GThe money window is shown.
 @>Text: \CNThe coins window is shown.
 @>Text: \G\CNThe money and coins windows are both 
  :    : shown. The coins window must be shown second.
 @>Text: \f[introBoy]The introBoy picture from the 
  :    : Graphics/Pictures folder is shown.
 @>Text: \ff[introBoy]The introBoy picture is shown again, but 
  :    : cropped to the top-left 96x96 pixels of it.
 @>Text: This is <icon=bagPocket3> bagPocket3 from the 
  :    : folder Graphics/Icons. Icons shown this 
  :    : way are not padded.
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Other]
 @>Text: \w[signskin]The windowskin has changed to 
  :    : "signskin" here.
 @>Text: \l[3]This message box has 3 lines to it rather than 2, 
  :    : so more text can be shown at once. Lorem ipsum 
  :    : dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
 @>Text: \wuThis message box is at the top.
 @>Text: \wmThis message box is in the middle.
 @>Text: \wuThis message box is\wm jumping around the 
  :    : screen\wd in a rather off-putting way.
 @>Text: \opThis message box slides on-screen at the start.
 @>Text: \clThis message box slides off-screen at the end.
 @>Text: \ts[]This text appeared instantly!
 @>Text: \ts[5]This text is slow to appear.
 @>Text: \se[Pkmn move learnt]Sound effect "Pkmn move 
  :    : learnt" was played.
 @>Text: Music effect "Item get" will be played.
  :    : \me[Item get]
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Cancel]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: A complete list of all message options is available on 
 :    : the wiki.
@>

Event ID: 003
Event Name: IntroBrett
(X,Y): (013,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Variables: [0027: Brett] = 1
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\ts[]<fs=30>Hey, \PN wait!</fs>
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Show Animation: Player, [Question bubble]
@>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
@>Play BGM: 'RivalTheme', 100, 100
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\PN where are you going?
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\ts[5]Oh?\ts[1]\n
 :    : Your Dad gave you a Pokémon?\n
 :    : That's great!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I didn't forget by the way.\n
 :    : Happy Birthday!
@>Play SE: 'Player jump', 90, 100
@>Set Move Route: [Brett]
 :              : $>Jump: +0,+0
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Here's your present!
@>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:POKEDOLL,1)
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I hope you like it! I made it for you.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Now, show me what Pokémon you got!\n
 :    : I'll be your first battle!
@>Script: EliteBattle.set(:nextBattleBack, :OUTDOOR)
@>Script: EliteBattle.assign_bgm("Trainer_Battle_Kanto.ogg",:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,0)
@>Script: EliteBattle.set(:nextBattleScript, {
:       : "turnstart0" => "Show me what you got!",
:       : "lowHPOpp" => "C'mon Marill hang in there!",
:       : "loss" => "Not bad for your first battle.",
:       : "faintedOpp" => "Wow! You're a natural!"
:       : })
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,"Brett",_I("You're pretty good!"),false,0,true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Let me heal your Pokémon.
 @>
: Else
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Let me heal your Pokémon.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I've been waiting for this day.
 :    : I'm excited we can both be trainers!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\ts[5]Oh! \n
 :    : \ts[1]You're also gonna need some of these!
@>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:POKEBALL,5)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Now, get out there!
@>Play BGM: '101', 80, 100
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Control Switches: [0068: BrettIntro] = ON
@>

(X,Y): (013,060)

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: NPC 03

Autonomous Movement
Type: Custom
Custom Move Route:
(Repeat Action)
$>Turn Left
$>Turn Right
$>Turn Down

Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 5: Higher
Options Enabled
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: I'm hunting for a <b>PICHU</b>!
@>Text: If you find one will you trade it to me for
 :    : this <b>LUCKY EGG</b>?
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch D == OFF
 @>Script: activateQuest(:Pichu, colorQuest("blue"),false)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Self Switch: D =ON
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbHasSpecies?(:PICHU)
 @>Text: Oh wow you found one!\n
  :    : Wanna trade?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pbChooseTradablePokemon(1,3)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: Oh, did you change your mind?
   @>Jump to Label: done
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRemovePokemonAt(pbGet(1)) if pbGetPokemon(1).isSpecies?(:PICHU)
    @>Text: Really trade <b>Pichu</b> for the <b>Lucky Egg</b>?
    @>Show Choices: Yes, No
    (When Cancel: Choice 2)
    : When [Yes]
     @>Text: \PN handed over <b>\v[3]</b> in exchange for <b>LUCKY EGG</b>!
     @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:LUCKYEGG,1)
     @>Text: Thanks! \nI promise I'll take good care of <b>\v[3]</b>.
     @>Play SE: 'Battle recall', 85, 100
     @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(39,"A",true)
     @>Show Animation: [PICHU_OW], [Dust]
     @>Script: completeQuest(:Pichu)
     @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
     @>Jump to Label: done
     @>
    : When [No]
     @>Jump to Label: done
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRemovePokemonAt(pbGet(1)) if !pbGetPokemon(1).isSpecies?(:PICHU)
    @>Text: You chose <b>\v[3]</b>, that's not a <b>PICHU</b>!
    @>Jump to Label: done
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Oh, did you change your mind?
  @>Jump to Label: done
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: done
@>

@>Text: I see you've got a Pokémon, do you know how to catch more Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Ah yes, of course you do.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: No?\n
  :    : Well you simply weaken them and then use a Pokéball.
 @>Text: Applying a status effect such as sleep can improve your chances.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Well just remember if you've ever seen a Pokémon, you can find out where to catch one of your own thanks to the Pokédex.
@>Text: Just check out the AREA screen and it will show you a Pokémon's habitat.
@>Text: Remember to take things slow, like my pal here Bruno.
@>Text: One can never spend too much time enjoying themselves on their journey.
@>Text: I'd like to give you this as a birthday present.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:CHERISHBALL)
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Control Variables: [0027: Brett] = 1
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\ts[]<fs=30>Hey, \PN wait!</fs>
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Show Animation: Player, [Question bubble]
@>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
@>Play BGM: 'RivalTheme', 100, 100
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\PN where are you going?
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\ts[5]Oh?\ts[1]\n
 :    : Your Dad gave you a Pokémon?\n
 :    : That's great!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I didn't forget by the way.\n
 :    : Happy Birthday!
@>Play SE: 'Player jump', 90, 100
@>Set Move Route: [Brett]
 :              : $>Jump: +0,+0
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Here's your present!
@>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:POKEDOLL,1)
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I hope you like it! I made it for you.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Now, show me what Pokémon you got!\n
 :    : I'll be your first battle!
@>Script: EliteBattle.set(:nextBattleBack, :OUTDOOR)
@>Script: EliteBattle.assign_bgm("Trainer_Battle_Kanto.ogg",:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,0)
@>Script: EliteBattle.set(:nextBattleScript, {
:       : "turnstart0" => "Show me what you got!",
:       : "lowHPOpp" => "C'mon Marill hang in there!",
:       : "loss" => "Not bad for your first battle.",
:       : "faintedOpp" => "Wow! You're a natural!"
:       : })
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,"Brett",_I("You're pretty good!"),false,0,true)
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Let me heal your Pokémon.
 @>
: Else
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Let me heal your Pokémon.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I've been waiting for this day.
 :    : I'm excited we can both be trainers!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]\ts[5]Oh! \n
 :    : \ts[1]You're also gonna need some of these!
@>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:POKEBALL,5)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Now, get out there!
@>Play BGM: '101', 80, 100
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Control Switches: [0068: BrettIntro] = ON
@>

Conditions

Graphic: BELLSPROUT

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.hasSeen?(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>
: Else
 @>Play SE: 'Voltorb Flip level up', 100, 100
 @>Text: Bellsprout's information was recorded in the 
  :    : Pokédex.
 @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>Script: $Trainer.setSeen(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Bellsprout]Byoowampph. (Bellsprout finds 
 :    : a random berry every 24 in-game hours!)
@>Script: berry = [
:       :   :CHERIBERRY,:CHESTOBERRY,:PECHABERRY,:RAWSTBERRY,:ASPEARBERRY,
:       :   :LUMBERRY,:ORANBERRY,:LEPPABERRY,:PERSIMBERRY,

:       :   :COBABERRY,:PAYAPABERRY,:TANGABERRY,:CHARTIBERRY,:KASIBBERRY,:HABANBERRY,:COLBURBERRY,:BABIRIBERRY,
:       :   :CHILANBERRY,
:       :   :LIECHIBERRY,:GANLONBERRY,:SALACBERRY,:PETAYABERRY,:APICOTBERRY,:LANSATBERRY,:STARFBERRY,:ENIGMABERRY,
:       :   :MICLEBERRY,:CUSTAPBERRY,:JABOCABERRY,:ROWAPBERRY,
:       :   :ENIGMABERRY
:       : ]
@>Script: random_item = berry.sample

Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (011,012)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 08

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm looking for an <b>EMOLGA.</b> Do you 
 :    : want to trade me for my <b>DRATINI</b>?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game 
  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemonForTrade(1,2,:EMOLGA)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \rI'll be here if you change your mind.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rOK, let's get started.
  @>Script: pbStartTrade(pbGet(1),
  :       : :DRATINI,"Luigi","VENDILY",1)
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : pkmn.iv[0]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[1]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[2]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[3]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[4]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[5]=25
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SCALESHOT)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:BIND)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:AQUATAIL)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SWIFT)
  @>Script: pkmn.calcStats
  @>Text: \PN traded Emolga for Dratini!
  @>Text: \rThanks, take good care of Luigi!
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rYou don't want to trade? Aww...
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement

Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Vendor
(X,Y): (062,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 17

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bHaven't seen you around here before, are you
 :    : a tourist?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \bOh well in that case take this, a local specialty!
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SHELLBELL)
 @>Text: \bThey're made from the many shells that wash up 
  :    : on shore, I can sell you some more if you're 
  :    : interested.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bAre you sure?\nI don't recognize you.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: NPC 17

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \G\bInterested in another Shell Bell for $4000?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 4000 or more
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:SHELLBELL)
   @>Text: \G\bHere you go!
   @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SHELLBELL)
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \G\bYour bag is full, make some room first.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\bYou don't have enough money.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: archaeologist
(X,Y): (028,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 24

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:JAKESPARCEL)
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]What?\nThis is from my brother in Trident Cove?
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]I wish he would stop sending me these seashells, he keeps calling them "Fossils"...
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]Well at least we stay in touch, it's not easy living out here in the desert.
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]Thanks for delivering this for him, I appreciate it.
 @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:JAKESPARCEL)
 @>Script: advanceQuestToStage(:SEAVOUCHER,3)
 @>Control Switches: [0146: JakeParcelDeliver] = ON
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == OFF
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]Welcome to Saltstone Mine!
 @>Script: activateQuest(:MINING, colorQuest("purple"), false)
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]Welcome back \PN.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Show Choices: Go Mining, Explanation, Cancel, Remove Quest
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Go Mining]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:PICKAXE)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:FRESHWATER)
   @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]Alright let's go!\n
    :    : Goodluck!
   @>Script: pbMiningGame
   @>Script: advanceQuestToStage(:MINING,2)
   @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem( 
   :       : :PICKAXE)
   :       : $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem( 
   :       : :FRESHWATER)
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]If you want to set out to do some mining you're gonna need some Fresh Water!
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]If you want to set out to do some mining you'll need a Pickaxe.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Explanation]
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]You'll have limited swings with your tools before 
  :    : the wall collapses to collect rare materials.
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]Each attempt will cost you some materials also, you'll 
  :    : need Fresh Water and a Pickaxe!
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]These materials are consumed after you go mining! 
  :    : You'll have to build a lot of them.
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]You can get Fresh Water from the vending machine 
  :    : over there, but its price is sky high!
 @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == OFF
  @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]Since you're so interested I'll help you out, here's a 
   :    : Pickaxe, you'll only get one for free!
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:PICKAXE)
  @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]You can make more Pickaxes at the anvil over there!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Cancel]
 @>
: When [Remove Quest]
 @>Text: \xn[Archaeologist]If the quest is annoying you I can remove it permanently?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: completeQuest(:MINING)
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Vending machine 2
(X,Y): (017,028)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
 @>Label: Start
 @>Text: It's a vending machine.\n
  :    : Which drink would you like?\G
 @>Show Choices: Fresh Water - $400, Soda Pop - $480, Lemonade - $640, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Fresh Water - $400]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 400 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Change Gold: - 400
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Text: \GA Fresh Water dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...20)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Fresh Water dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Soda Pop - $480]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 480 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:SODAPOP)
    @>Change Gold: - 480
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:SODAPOP)
    @>Text: \GA Soda Pop dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...25)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:SODAPOP)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:SODAPOP)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Soda Pop dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Lemonade - $640]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 640 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:LEMONADE)
    @>Change Gold: - 640
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:LEMONADE)
    @>Text: \GA Lemonade dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...30)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:LEMONADE)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:LEMONADE)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Lemonade dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>Text: \GDecided not to buy a drink.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Text: \xn[Conductor]Welcome to the Onix Express!
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == OFF
 @>Text: \xn[Conductor]Onix can transport you to any
  :    : destination you've been to before instantly!
 @>Text: \xn[Conductor]Make sure to speak to the 
  :    : Conductors in each town you visit!

 @>

@>Label: a
@>Text: \xn[Conductor]Where would you like to go?\ch[1,9,Seafoam City, Bouldergrove, Anthrophil, Emberton, Saltstone Villa, Neon City, Glacier City, Soul City, Fortune City, 
 :    : Victory Plateau]
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
 @>Text: So, you want to go to Seafoam City?

 : When [Yes]

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount

  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0

 :       : should provide a fixed Apricorn, have a 24 hour delay 
 :       : (like Kurt does), and should look different to 
 :       : Headbutt trees.
@>Script: apricorns = [
:       :   :REDAPRICORN,
:       :   :YELLOWAPRICORN,
:       :   :BLUEAPRICORN,
:       :   :GREENAPRICORN,
:       :   :PINKAPRICORN,
:       :   :WHITEAPRICORN,
:       :   :BLACKAPRICORN
:       : ]
@>Script: random_item = apricorns.sample
:       : pbItemBall(random_item)

:       : )

  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.

  @>Text: \bI'll be here if you change your mind.

 : Else

  :       : pkmn.iv[1]=30

  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:COUNTER)

  :       : pkmn.calcStats

   :    : TORCHIC</b>!
  @>Text: \bTake good care of Pluck!

  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End

Event ID: 004
Event Name: Healing balls
(X,Y): (005,002)

Page #1
Conditions

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

Page #2

Event ID: 009
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.

  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
