Event ID: 012
Event Name: EV012
(X,Y): (004,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 26

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm looking for a <b>GEODUDE.</b> Do you 
 :    : want to trade me for my <b>VULPIX</b>.
@>Script: activateQuest(:VULPIX, colorQuest("Yellow"),false)
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game 
  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemonForTrade(1,2,:GEODUDE)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \rI'll be here if you change your mind.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rOK, let's get started.
  @>Script: pbStartTrade(pbGet(1),
  :       :    :VULPIX,"Cinder","EMILY",1)
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : pkmn.iv[0]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[1]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[2]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[3]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[4]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[5]=25
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:FIRESPIN)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:BATONPASS)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:TACKLE)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EMBER)
  @>Script: pkmn.calcStats
  @>Text: \PN traded Geodude for Vulpix!
  @>Text: \rThanks, take good care of Cinder.
  @>Script: completeQuest(:VULPIX)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rYou don't want to trade? Aww...
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions

Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bI'm so happy with my new Geodude!

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bUh...\nOh, yes, I'm the Move Deleter.
@>Text: \bI can make Pokémon forget their moves.
@>Text: \bWould you like me to do that?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: ChoosePokemon
 @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon should forget a move?
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
   :    : forgotten.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
   @>Text: \bWhat? No Egg should know any moves.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).isShadow? rescue false)
   @>Text: \bWhat? I can't make a Shadow Pokémon forget a 
    :    : move.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).numMoves==1
   @>Text: \b\v[3] seems to know only one move...
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \bWhich move should be forgotten?
  @>Script: pbChooseMove(pbGetPokemon(1),2,4)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 0
   @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \bHm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Play ME: '013-Gag02', 100, 100
    @>Wait: 80 frame(s)
    @>Script: pbGetPokemon(1).pbDeleteMoveAtIndex(
    :       :    pbGet(2))
    @>Text: \bIt worked to perfection!
    @>Text: \b\v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
     :    : forgotten.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
  :    : forgotten.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : want to trade me for my <b>STARYU</b>?
@>Script: activateQuest(:STARYU,colorQuest("yellow"),false)
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game 
  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemonForTrade(1,2,:DIGLETT)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \bI'll be here if you change your mind.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \bOK, let's get started.
  @>Script: pbStartTrade(pbGet(1),:STARYU,"Max","Erick")
  @>Text: \PN traded Diglett for Staryu!
  @>Text: \bThanks! Take good care of Max!
  @>Script: completeQuest(:STARYU)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bYou don't want to trade? Aww...
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event Name: Poké Center door
(X,Y): (043,027)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: doors3

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>SE: 'Door enter', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Set Move Route: Player
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
@>Transfer Player:[210: Gold Coast Pokemart], (004,007), Up, No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

Page #2
Conditions

Options Enabled

                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>SE: 'Door enter', 100, 100
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

$>Turn Right

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

Stop Animation

List of Event Commands:

@>Text: Maybe one of your Pokémon could impress it?
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch D == OFF
 @>Script: activateQuest(:ORICORIO, colorQuest("blue"),false)
 @>Control Self Switch: D =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbChooseTradablePokemon(1, 2,
:       :   proc { |pkmn|
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:QUIVERDANCE) ||
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:DRAGONDANCE) ||
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:FIERYDANCE)  ||
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:FEATHERDANCE)||
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:TEETERDANCE) ||
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:SWORDSDANCE) ||
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:LUNARDANCE)  ||
:       :    pkmn.hasMove?(:PETALDANCE)  ||
@>Script:   pkmn.hasMove?(:REVELATIONDANCE)   
:       :   }
:       : )
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
 @>Text: It seems unimpressed by your Pokémon.
 @>
: Else
 @>Show Animation: This event, [Exclaim bubble]
 @>Text: The Oricorio is impressed, it hands you a small egg!
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGenerateEgg(:ORICORIO)
  @>Play ME: 'Egg get', 100, 100
  @>Control Switches: [0180: Oricorio] = ON
  @>Script: completeQuest(:ORICORIO)
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: But, \PN does not have enough space in their party.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

(X,Y): (006,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 28

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[Plant Maniac]Aren't plants lovely?
 :    : Do you like my plants?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Plant Maniac]I know aren't they great!
 @>Text: \xn[Plant Maniac]Tell me if you could be a plant what plant would you 
  :    : be?
 @>Show Choices: A tree, A flower, A fruit, A vegetable
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [A tree]
  @>
 : When [A flower]
  @>
 : When [A fruit]
  @>
 : When [A vegetable]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \xn[Plant Maniac]Oh how peculiar, I hadn't thought about that.
  :    : You should take this, I don't really want it since it's 
  :    : not a plant.
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:LEAFSTONE)
 @>Jump to Label: a
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \xn[Plant Maniac]What? You must be joking.
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: a
@>Text: \xn[Plant Maniac]Say, have you ever seen a Vileplume? If you could show me one I'd really appreciate it.
@>Script: activateQuest(:Vileplume, colorQuest("blue"),false)
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

   :              : $>Direction Fix OFF
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Turn Up
  @>Script: pbSmashThisEvent
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: This tree looks like it can be cut with an appropriate 
  :    : item.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>SE: 'Door enter', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Set Move Route: Player
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

@>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
@>Transfer Player:[121: Eevee House], (004,011), Up, No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

  @>Text: \bWould you like me to teach another Pokémon a 
   :    : special move?

 : Else

  @>
 : Branch End

   :    : special move?

   :    : special move?

   @>Jump to Label: Start
   @>

 : Else
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End

@>Text: \xn[Conductor]Welcome to the Onix Express!
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == OFF
 @>Text: \xn[Conductor]Onix can transport you to any
  :    : destination you've been to before instantly!
 @>Text: \xn[Conductor]Make sure to speak to the 
  :    : Conductors in each town you visit!
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: a
@>Text: \xn[Conductor]Where would you like to go?\ch[1,10,Seafoam City, Bouldergrove, Anthrophil, Emberton, Saltstone Villa, Neon City, Glacier City, Soul City, Fortune City, 
 :    : Cancel, Victory Plateau]
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
 @>Text: So, you want to go to Seafoam City?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No

 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0159: Seafoam] == ON

 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]

    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.

  :       : pkmn.iv[1]=30

  :       : pkmn.iv[3]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[4]=10

  :       : pkmn.calcStats

   :    : FARFETCH'D</b>!

(X,Y): (016,008)

Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \G\CN\bWelcome to Rocket Game Corner!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: !$PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:COINCASE)
 @>Text: \G\CN\bDo you need some game coins?\nWould you 
  :    : like to buy some?
 @>Text: \G\CN\bYou don't have a Coin Case.
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start menu
 @>Text: \G\CN\bDo you need some game coins?\nWould you 
  :    : like to buy some?
 @>Show Choices: 50 coins [$500], 500 coins [$5,000], Exit
 (When Cancel: Choice 3)
 : When [50 coins [$500]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.coins + 50 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\bWhoops!\nYour Coin Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 499 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\bYou can't afford the coins.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 500
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins += 50
    @>Text: \G\CN\bThank you\nHere are your coins!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [500 coins [$5,000]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.coins + 500 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\bWhoops!\nYour Coin Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 4999 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\bYou can't afford the coins.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 5000
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins += 500
    @>Text: \G\CN\bThank you\nHere are your coins!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Exit]
  @>Text: \G\CN\bNo?\nPlease come play sometime!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Jump to Label: Start menu
@>

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

  :    : Which drink would you like?\G
 @>Show Choices: Fresh Water - $400, Soda Pop - $480, Lemonade - $640, Cancel

 : When [Fresh Water - $400]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 400 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Change Gold: - 400
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Text: \GA Fresh Water dropped down!

   @>

Event ID: 032
Event Name: Vending machine 2
(X,Y): (016,029)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
 @>Label: Start
 @>Text: It's a vending machine.\n
  :    : Which drink would you like?\G
 @>Show Choices: Fresh Water - $400, Soda Pop - $480, Lemonade - $640, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Fresh Water - $400]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 400 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Change Gold: - 400
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Text: \GA Fresh Water dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...20)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Fresh Water dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Soda Pop - $480]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 480 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:SODAPOP)
    @>Change Gold: - 480
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:SODAPOP)
    @>Text: \GA Soda Pop dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...25)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:SODAPOP)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:SODAPOP)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Soda Pop dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Lemonade - $640]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 640 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:LEMONADE)
    @>Change Gold: - 640
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:LEMONADE)
    @>Text: \GA Lemonade dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...30)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:LEMONADE)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:LEMONADE)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Lemonade dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>Text: \GDecided not to buy a drink.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

Freq: 3: Low

@>Script: cur=numfloors-pbGet(10)
:       : pbSet(11,Kernel.pbMessage(
:       :     _I("Which floor do you want?"),
:       :     [_I("5F"),_I("4F"),_I("3F"),
:       :     _I("2F"),_I("1F"),_I("Exit")],
:       :     numfloors+1,nil,cur))
@>Script: t=pbGet(11)
:       : pbSet(11,numfloors-t)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] == 0
 @>Comment: Choice was cancelled.
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] > Variable [0010: Elevator current floor]
  @>Comment: Go up.
  @>Screen Shake: 4, 9, @12
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall left]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall middle]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall right]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0010: Elevator current floor] += 1
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] < Variable [0010: Elevator current floor]
  @>Comment: Go down.
  @>Screen Shake: 4, 9, @12
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall left]
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall middle]
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall right]
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0010: Elevator current floor] -= 1
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Show Picture: 2, 'introbase', Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @15, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Text: \bHello! It's good you've arrived!
@>Text: \bWelcome to Pokémon Alexandrite.
@>Text: \bMy name is Professor Yew.
@>Label: Help Choices
@>Text: \bDo you need any help?
@>Show Choices: No information needed., See controls
(When Cancel: Choice 1)
: When [No information needed.]
 @>Text: \bWell then, without further ado...
 @>
: When [See controls]
 @>Script: pbEventScreen(ButtonEventScene)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \bPlease review the Game Documentation
 :    : as it answers 99% of the common questions!
@>Text: \ts[]\l[2]Please select your game difficulty.\n\c[1]Once selected this CAN NOT be changed.
@>Label: difficulty
@>Text: \l[3]Select each mode to learn more about it.
@>Show Choices: Eevee, Mew, Mewtwo, Arceus
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Eevee]
 @>Text: \l[2]\c[10]Eevee Mode \c[0]offers no restrictions and plays like a vanilla game.
 @>Show Choices: Go Back, Choose Eevee Mode
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Go Back]
  @>Jump to Label: difficulty
  @>
 : When [Choose Eevee Mode]
  @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:EEVEE)
  @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 0
  :       : $game_variables[99] = 0
  @>Jump to Label: gamemodes
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Mew]
 @>Text: \ts[]\l[3]\c[5]Mew Mode\c[0] forces the SET battle style and allows no more than 3 items per trainer battle.
 @>Show Choices: Go Back, Choose Mew Mode
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Go Back]
  @>Jump to Label: difficulty
  @>
 : When [Choose Mew Mode]
  @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:MEW)
  @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 1
  :       : $game_variables[99] = 1
  @>Jump to Label: gamemodes
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Mewtwo]
 @>Text: \ts[]\l[5]\c[9]Mewtwo Mode\c[0] forces the SET battle style and allows no more than 1 item per trainer battle. In addition, you will have a level cap which is based on 
  :    : the number of gym badges you have.
 @>Show Choices: Go Back, Mewtwo Mode
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Go Back]
  @>Jump to Label: difficulty
  @>
 : When [Mewtwo Mode]
  @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:MEWTWO)
  @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 2
  :       : $game_variables[99] = 2
  @>Jump to Label: gamemodes
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Arceus]
 @>Text: \ts[]\l[8]\c[12]Arceus Mode\c[0] uses SET battle style and bans items from trainer battles. You will have a level cap based on the number of badges you have. All 
  :    : trainer battles will scale based on your level. Enemy teams are harder and have better move sets, berries can't be planted; they are finite, NUZLOCKE MODE is 
  :    : enabled.
 @>Show Choices: Go Back, Choose Arceus Mode
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Go Back]
  @>Jump to Label: difficulty
  @>
 : When [Choose Arceus Mode]
  @>Text: \l[2]\c[1]You must select all options to be eligible for achievement.
  @>Script: EliteBattle.startNuzlocke
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0176: Nuzlocke Elligible] == OFF
   @>Text: \r\ts[]\l[3]Nuzlocke mode must be enabled with all options for Arceus mode, returning to difficulty selection.
   @>Jump to Label: difficulty
   @>
  : Branch End

  @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 3
  :       : $game_variables[99] = 3
  @>Control Switches: [0177: Arceus_Mode] = ON
  @>Jump to Label: Intro2
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: gamemodes
@>Text: \ts[]\l[5]Enable special gamemodes?\nYou can toggle these modes off at a later time at your home PC.\nNUZLOCKE must be enabled now to unlock the achievement.

(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Done]

Map ID: 119

Tileset: 003: Inside

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Triple Triad explainer
(X,Y): (002,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 08

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm here to explain the rules of Triple Triad.
@>Label: Choices
@>Text: \rWhich topic do you want to learn about?
@>Show Choices: Basics, Game rules, Prizes, Exit
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Basics]
 @>Text: \rTriple Triad is a game played with special square 
  :    : cards placed on a 3x3 board.
 @>Text: \rEach card has 4 numbers on it, one per side.  
  :    : These numbers are so-called stats.
 @>Text: \rPlayers take turns placing cards on the board. As 
  :    : they do so, they try to capture and gain control of 
  :    : their opponent's cards.
 @>Text: \rThat's where the numbers come in. If a player 
  :    : places a card with a higher number next to a card 
  :    : with a lower number, the player captures that card.
 @>Text: \rThus, the goal of the game is to gain control of more 
  :    : cards than the other player by the end of the game.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Game rules]
 @>Text: \rThere are a number of optional game rules you can 
  :    : apply to individual games.
 @>Text: \rThey can affect card stats, how cards capture 
  :    : each other, the scoring and the prizes.
 @>Show Choices: Count Hand, Elements, Same Number, Grid Wrap
 (When Cancel: Branch)
 : When [Count Hand]
  @>Text: \rCount Hand rules count the unplayed cards in a player's hand as points.
  @>
 : When [Elements]
  @>Text: \rEach space on the board is assigned a random type.
   :    : If a card is placed on a space with the same type,
   :    : it gains +1 to all its values (values can even go beyond "A" because of this).
   :    : This bonus only applies to a newly-played card attempting to capture other cards; 
  @>Text: \rthe bonus is removed afterwards
  @>
 : When [Same Number]
  @>Text: \rCards are also captured if their touching number is 
   :    : equal to the newly-played card's number, 
   :    : as well as if it is less than the newly-played card's number. 
   :    : Also, the captured cards then immediately attempt to capture any cards touching them.
  @>
 : When [Grid Wrap]
  @>Text: \rThe board wraps around on itself in all directions, so there are no edges. 
   :    : For example, the top of a card played in the top centre spot will touch the
   :    :  bottom of a card in the bottom centre spot, and may capture it.
  @>
 : When Cancel
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Prizes]
 @>Text: \rWhen you win a game, you will recive 1 random 
  :    : card from your opponent from their Deck.
 @>Text: \rThis also works the other way around: if you lose, 
  :    : you have to give your opponent one of your cards, 
  :    : chosen at random.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Exit]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : My Eevee is so upset, you see it really wants
 :    : a <b>TAMATOBERRY</b>.
@>Script: activateQuest(:EEVEE, colorQuest("blue"),false)
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:TAMATOBERRY)
 @>Text: \rOh you've got a <b>TAMATOBERRY</b>!
  :    : Can you give it to Eevee?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]

   :    : Eevee!

  @>Text: The Pokémon ate the berry and seems happy!
  @>Text: \rOh dear it seems like the Eevee want's
   :    : another type of berry.
  @>Text: \rCan you come back with a <b>RAWSTBERRY</b>?
  @>Script: advanceQuestToStage(:EEVEE,2)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End

 :    : Ah, who am I kidding, I know you do. \n
 :    : Lets go!

Event ID: 023
Event Name: Day Care Man
(X,Y): (031,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 18

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbEggGenerated?
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAh, it's you!
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bWe were raising your Pokémon, and my goodness, 
  :    : were we surprised!
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYour Pokémon was holding an Egg!
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bWe don't know how it got there, but your Pokémon 
  :    : had it.
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYou do want it, don't you?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.party_full?
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYou have no room for it right now... Come back 
    :    : when you've made room.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\me[Egg get]\PN received the Egg from the Day-Care 
   :    : Man.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: pbDayCareGenerateEgg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bI really will keep it. You do want this Egg, yes?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bWell all right then, I'll take it. Thank you.
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThat is, I don't think we'll ever find another...
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bNo, no, I'm sure we'll find another one. I'm definitely 
    :    : sure of it!
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
   :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 0
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bI'm the Day-Care Man.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bI help take care of the precious Pokémon of 
   :    : trainers.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAny Pokémon you'd like to have raised you can 
   :    : leave in my daughter's care.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 1
  @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(-1, 3, -1)
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYour \v[3] is doing just fine.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 2
  @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(0, 3, -1)
  :       : pbDayCareGetDeposited(1, 4, -1)
  :       : pbDayCareGetCompatibility(5)
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYour \v[3] and \v[4] are doing just fine.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 0
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two play with other Pokémon rather than with 
    :    : each other...
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 1
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two don't seem to like each other much.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 2
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two seem to get along.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 3
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two seem to get along very well.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>SE: 'Door enter', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

  :              : $>Turn Left

 :       : for i in 1..count

  :              : $>Stop Animation ON

  :              : $>Turn Down

   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.

   :    : exceptionally well.

 : Else

 :       : pkmn.hp = 1

  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?

 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)

    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.

  :              : $>Graphic: "computer_on', 0, 2, 1

  @>Jump to Label: done
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Analyzing \v[3]'s Effort Values...
  @>Script: pbSet(45,pbGetPokemon(1).ev[:HP])
  @>Script: pbSet(46,pbGetPokemon(1).ev[:ATTACK])
  @>Script: pbSet(47,pbGetPokemon(1).ev[:DEFENSE])
  @>Script: pbSet(48,pbGetPokemon(1).ev[:SPEED])
  @>Script: pbSet(49,pbGetPokemon(1).ev[:SPECIAL_ATTACK])
  @>Script: pbSet(50,pbGetPokemon(1).ev[:SPECIAL_DEFENSE])
  @>Text: \l[6]\v[45] - HP\n\v[46] - ATTACK\n\v[47] - DEFENSE\n\v[48] - SPEED\n\v[49] - SP ATTACK\n\v[50] - SP DEFENSE
  @>Text: Would you like to reset on of \v[3]'s Effort Values?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: Reset which EV?\ch[2,6,HP,ATK,DEF,SPEED,SP.ATK,SP.DEF]
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] == 0
    @>Play SE: 'GUI naming confirm', 80, 100

    (When Cancel: Choice 2)

     :       : pbGetPokemon(1).calc_stats

    @>

(X,Y): (009,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096: PokeTrainerMember] == ON
 @>Text: Thank you for your membership!
 @>Text: Would you like to purchase a pass for the EV training 
  :    : zone? The cost is $500 per 5 minutes for members.
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: Hello trainer, welcome the the Pokémon Training Club.
 @>Text: Would you like to purchase a pass for the EV training 
  :    : zone? The cost is $1000 per 5 minutes.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: A
@>Show Choices: No, Yes, More Information
(When Cancel: Choice 1)
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again.
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Move Down
 @>
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Excellent, I will take the payment then.
  :    : Good-luck!
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096: PokeTrainerMember] == ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 499 or less
   @>Text: Oh uh, you seem to be a little short on funds.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Change Gold: - 500
   @>Jump to Label: B
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 999 or less
   @>Text: Oh uh, you seem to be a little short on funds.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Change Gold: - 1000
   @>Jump to Label: B
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Label: B
 @>Control Switches: [0099: EVTRAINING] = ON
 @>Control Switches: [0100: RESERVE(LEVELSCALE)] = ON
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Move Up
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Timer: Startup (5 min. 0 sec.)
 @>Transfer Player:[146: PKMN Training Field], (009,009)
 @>
: When [More Information]
 @>Text: The EV training zone is useful for powering up your 
  :    : Pokémon. 
 @>Text: \l[3]Each Pokémon has a maximum potential of 512 EV's 
  :    : and a maximum of 252 in one stat.
 @>Text: \l[3]4 EV's translates to an increase of 1 point in a 
  :    : particular stat. So the ideal number is 252 EV's per 
  :    : stat.
 @>Text: \l[3]Once you enter the training zone you will have five 
  :    : minutes to participate in battles against Pokémon.
 @>Text: \l[3]Each type of Pokémon translates to a particular EV 
  :    : that you will gain, for instance fighting Pidgey adds 
  :    : one point of speed EV.
 @>Text: \l[3]Once your time expires you must purchase another 
  :    : pass.
 @>Text: \l[3]It is worth nothing that the Pokémon in the zone will 
  :    : scale based on the average level of your party!
 @>Text: \l[3]Also your time spend inside of battles is not counted. 
  :    : We're not cheapskates!
 @>Jump to Label: A
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Hello there Trainer.\nWelcome to the Pokémon trainer's club!
@>Text: \l[3]The facility computers are members only.
 :    : If you'd like to buy a membership it only costs
 :    : $3000.
@>Text: \l[3]You can get a 50% discount on training
 :    : passes also, normally it's $1000 per five
 :    : minute session.
@>Show Choices: No, Yes
(When Cancel: Choice 1)
: When [No]
 @>Text: \l[3]Understandable, please come see us again when 
  :    : you want to train your Pokémon to their fullest 
  :    : potential!
 @>
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 2999 or less
  @>Text: I'm sorry you don't seem to have adequate funds.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Oh, excellent! 
  @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
  @>Change Gold: - 3000
  @>Text: \PN got a Pokémon Trainer's Club card!
  @>Play SE: 'KeyItem', 100, 100
  @>Control Switches: [0096: PokeTrainerMember] = ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Eve Reflection
(X,Y): (006,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_POKEMONTRAINER_May

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0134: MetEve] == ON
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rOh! \PN It's good to see you again.
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rListen, I need your help.
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rSince you're a trainer I should probably tell you,
  :    : Team Rocket and I had a little encounter here.
  :    : They took my <b>Poliwhirl</b>!
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rI can see you've got some gym badges so 
  :    : I know you're strong!
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rHey there trainer, what's your name?
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rOh \PN ?\nNice to meet you I'm Eve!
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rAre you from around here?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rI'm from Anthrophil myself, but it's been a while since I've been home.
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rOh where are you from?
  @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rEarthroot! That's really far!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rSince you're a trainer I should probably tell you,
  :    : Team Rocket and I had a little encounter here.
  :    : They took my <b>Poliwhirl</b>!
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rSince you're a trainer I was hoping you might be up to helping me.
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rI can see you've got some gym badges so maybe the two of us can take them on.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Eve]\rTo make it worth your while I have a <b>Pokéflute</b> I could repay you with.
@>Script: activateQuest(:POLIWHIRL, colorQuest("Green"),false)
@>Show Choices: Help Eve, Later
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Help Eve]
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rYes! I knew you'd help me.
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rMy Pokémon are hurt pretty badly so can 
  :    : you handle the battling?
 @>Play ME: 'Egg get', 80, 100
 @>Text: Eve joined the party!
 @>Script: pbAddDependency2(@event_id,"Eve",2)
 @>Control Switches: [0094: EveFollow] = ON
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: When [Later]
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rOh.. I understand. Don't wait too long, okay?
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>

@>Script: pbTrainerEnd
@>

@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:POPPINGCANDY)
 @>Text: Give <b>POPPING CANDY</b> to the <b>DUNSPARCE</b>?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \PN gave the <b>POPPINGCANDY</b>.
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Heart Emote]
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:POPPINGCANDY)
  @>Text: The <b>DUNSPARCE</b> seems happy, it wants to join you!
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGenPkmn(:DUNSPARCE,30)
  :       : pkmn.item = :TM15
  :       : pkmn.iv[:HP] = 31
  :       : pkmn.iv[:ATTACK] = 31
  :       : pkmn.iv[:DEFENSE] = 25
  :       : pkmn.iv[:SPEED] = 20
  :       : pkmn.iv[:SPECIAL_ATTACK] = 20
  :       : pkmn.iv[:SPECIAL_DEFENSE] = 31
  :       : pkmn.calcStats
  :       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn)
  @>Script: completeQuest(:DUNSPARCE, colorQuest("Blue"),false)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End

Page #2
Conditions

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End

  :    : you.

@>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 0
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rI'm the Day-Care Girl. We can raise Pokémon for 
  :    : you.
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rWould you like us to raise your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemon_count <= 1
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rOh? But you only have one Pokémon with you.
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rYou can't go off without a Pokémon. Come back 
    :    : another time.
   @>Exit Event Processing

  : Branch End

  @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1, 3)

   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rOh, fine, then.\nCome again.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End

   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rIf you leave me that Pokémon, what are you gonna 
    :    : battle with?
   @>Text: \rCome back another time.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rFine, we'll raise your \v[3] for a while.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rCome back for it later.
  @>Label: RaiseAnother
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rWe can raise two of your Pokémon. Would you like 
   :    : us to raise another?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemon_count <= 1
    @>Text: \rOh? But you only have one Pokémon with you.
    @>Text: \rYou can't go off without a Pokémon. Come back 
     :    : another time.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rWhich Pokémon should we raise for you?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1, 3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rIf you leave me that Pokémon, what are you gonna 
     :    : battle with?
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rCome back another time.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rFine, we'll raise your \v[3] for a while.
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rCome back for it later.
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
    @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rOh, fine, then.\nCome again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rAh, it's you! Good to see you. Now, about your 
  :    : Pokémon...
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(0, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(1, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 1
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
  @>
 : Else
  @>Label: TakeBack
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rDo you want your Pokémon back?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Label: TakeBackChosen
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.party_full?
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rYour Pokémon team is full. Make room, then come 
     :    : see me.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareChoose(
   :       :   _I("Which one do you want back?"),
   :       :   1
   :       : )
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(pbGet(1), 3, 4)
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\G\rIf you want your \v[3] back, it will cost $\v[4].
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = Gold
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] < Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
     @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\G\rYou don't have enough money...
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Change Gold: - Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
    @>Script: pbDayCareWithdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\G\rExcellent\nHere's your Pokémon.
    @>Text: \PN took \v[3] back from the Day-Care Girl.
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 1
     @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rDo you want to take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 003
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 158
Map Name: Silph Co. Elevator
Tileset: 010: Department Store
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Exit
(X,Y): (002,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 7
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0051: Silph_Elevator_Unlock] >= 2
  @>Transfer Player:[162: 7F Silpho Co], (015,003), No Fade
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Huh?\n
   :    : The doors wont open.
  @>Text: Might be controlled by a switch somewhere.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 6
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0051: Silph_Elevator_Unlock] >= 1
   @>Transfer Player:[002: 6F Silph Co], (015,004), No Fade
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Huh?\n
    :    : The doors wont open.
   @>Text: Might be controlled by a switch somewhere.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 5
   @>Transfer Player:[001: 5F Silph Co], (015,004), No Fade
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 4
    @>Transfer Player:[161: 4F Silpho Co], (015,003), No Fade
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 3
     @>Transfer Player:[159: 3F Silpho Co], (015,003), No Fade
     @>
    : Else
     @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0010: Elevator current floor] == 2
      @>Transfer Player:[157: Silph Co.], (010,024), No Fade
      @>
     : Else
      @>Transfer Player:[157: Silph Co.], (010,041), No Fade
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

 : When [Hand over Pokemon]

 : When [No.]

 :       : pkmn.hp = 1

  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?

 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].

 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else

 :    : want to trade me for my <b>POLIWAG</b>?

 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game

   :    : POLIWAG</b>!

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 006
Event Name: Move Relearner
(X,Y): (009,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_RUINMANIAC (2)

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: isTempSwitchOff?("A")
 @>Text: \bI'm the Pokémon Move Maniac.
 @>Text: \bI know every single move that Pokémon learn 
  :    : growing up.
 @>Text: \bI'm also a collector of Heart Scales.
 @>Text: \bIf you bring me one, I'll teach a move to one of your 
  :    : Pokémon.
 @>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:HEARTSCALE)
 @>Text: \bOh! That's it! That's an honest to goodness Heart 
  :    : Scale!
 @>Text: \bLet me guess, you want me to teach one of your 
  :    : Pokémon a move?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon needs tutoring?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3, proc{ |pkmn|
  :       :   pkmn.can_relearn_move?
  :       :   }, true
  :       : )
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbGetPokemon(1).can_relearn_move?
   @>Text: \bSorry...
   @>Text: \bIt doesn't appear as if I have any move I can teach 
    :    : to your \v[3].
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
   :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
    :    : with a Heart Scale.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
    @>Text: \bHunh? There isn't a single move that I can teach an 
     :    : Egg.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
    @>Text: \bNo way, I don't want to go near a Shadow 
     :    : Pokémon..
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \bWhich move should I teach to your \v[3]?
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRelearnMoveScreen(pbGetPokemon(1))
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:HEARTSCALE)
    @>Text: \PN handed over one Heart Scale in exchange.
    @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
     :    : with a Heart Scale.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
     :    : with a Heart Scale.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
   :    : with a Heart Scale.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
  :    : with a Heart Scale.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 009
Event Name: Name Rater
(X,Y): (013,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 10

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bHello, hello!\nI am the official Name Rater!
@>Text: \bWant me to rate the nicknames of your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon's nickname should I critique?
 @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon.  The index 
  :       : is stored in variable 1, the name in variable 3.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for eggs.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
  @>Text: \bNow, now... That is merely an Egg!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).isShadow? rescue false)
  @>Text: \bI wouldn't dare critique a Shadow Pokémon's name!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isForeign?($Trainer)
  @>Text: \bHmmm... \v[3] it is!
  @>Text: \bThis is a magnificent nickname! It is impeccably 
   :    : beyond reproach!
  @>Text: \bYou'll do well to cherish your \v[3] now and 
   :    : beyond.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \b\v[3], is it?\nThat is a decent nickname!
 @>Text: \bBut, would you like me to give it a nicer name?
 @>Text: \bHow about it?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \bAh, good. Then, what shall the new nickname be?
  @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : species=PBSpecies.getName(pkmn.species)
  :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",0,10,5)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5)=="" || pbGet(5)==pbGet(3)
   @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
   @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.name=PBSpecies.getName(
   :       :                         pkmn.species)
   :       : pbSet(3,pkmn.name)
   @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
    :    : as \v[3]!
   @>Text: \bIt looks no different from before, and yet, this is 
    :    : vastly superior!
   @>Text: \bHow fortunate for you!
   @>
  : Else
   @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon indexed at variable 1 and 
    :       : changes its name to variable 5.
   @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.name=pbGet(5)
   @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
    :    : as \v[5]!
   @>Text: \bIt is a better name than before!\nHow fortunate for 
    :    : you!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  :    : \.*sniff sniff*

@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
 @>Text: \bOh, no mushrooms?
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>

@>Label: Sell
@>Text: \bSo how about it? \G
@>Script: pbChooseItemFromList(_I("Choose a mushroom to sell"),1,:TINYMUSHROOM, :BIGMUSHROOM, :BALMMUSHROOM)
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_variables[1] == :TINYMUSHROOM
 @>Comment: Relic Copper is selected.
 @>Text: \bAh yes, <b>TINY MUSHROOM</b>. It's quite 
  :    : delicious, I'll offer you 3000$.\G
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:TINYMUSHROOM)
  @>Change Gold: + 3000
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Jump to Label: Sell
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_variables[1] == :BIGMUSHROOM
 @>Comment: Relic Silver is selected.
 @>Text: \bOh, <b>BIG MUSHROOM</b>. It's a delicacy.
  :    : I'll offer you 6000$.\G
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:BIGMUSHROOM)
  @>Change Gold: + 6000
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Jump to Label: Sell
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_variables[1] == :BALMMUSHROOM
 @>Comment: Relic Crown is selected.
 @>Play ME: 'Slots big win', 100, 100
 @>Text: \bNo way! <b>BALM MUSHROOM</b>? It's 
  :    : fantastically rare! I'll offer you 30000$.\G
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:BALMMUSHROOM)
  @>Change Gold: + 30000
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Jump to Label: Sell
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
 @>Text: \bCome back soon.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Exit
(X,Y): (007,009)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:

@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Transfer Player:[173: Route 109], (086,010), No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

Event ID: 003
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 007
Event Name: EV007
(X,Y): (002,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar055_2

Autonomous Movement
Type: Random
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm looking for a <b>PIKACHU</b>? Do you 
 :    : want to trade me for my <b>CHARMELEON</b>?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game 
  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.
 @>Script: activateQuest(:CHARMELEON,colorQuest("Yellow"),false)
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemonForTrade(1,2,:PIKACHU)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \rI'll be here if you change your mind.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rOK, let's get started.
  @>Script: pbStartTrade(pbGet(1),
  :       :    :CHARMELEON,"Sherman","CHEYENNE")
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : pkmn.setItem(:LIFEORB)
  :       : pkmn.iv[0]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[1]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[2]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[3]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[4]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[5]=25
  :       : pkmn.level=15
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:FLAMETHROWER)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:FIREPUNCH)
  @>Script: pkmn.pbLearnMove(:DIG)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SMOKESCREEN)
  :       : pkmn.makeMale
  @>Text: \PN traded <b>PIKACHU</b> for <b>
   :    : CHARMANDER</b>!
  @>Text: \rTake good care of Sherman!
  @>Script: completeQuest(:CHARMELEON,colorQuest("Yellow"),false)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rYou don't want to trade? Aww...
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: trchar055_2

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rYour Pikachu is doing great!
@>

 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:ICEDIVER,"Sarah", nil, nil, 1)

  :       : :ICEDIVER,"Sarah", 3
  :       : )
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPhoneBattleCount(:ICEDIVER,"Sarah") >= 1
 @>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:ICEDIVER)
 @>Text: \rThis time you're going under!
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:ICEDIVER,"Sarah", nil, nil, 2)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>

@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]

  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)

 :       :   pbWait(16)

  :              : $>Stop Animation ON

  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion

  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.

   :    : exceptionally well.

 : Else

 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon

    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>

   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100

 :       : Headbutt trees.

:       :   :REDAPRICORN,
:       :   :YELLOWAPRICORN,

 :    : me first!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:TRAILBLAZER,"Mitchell")
 @>Script: pbPhoneRegisterBattle(_I("\\bCan I add you to my contacts list?"),get_character(0),:TRAILBLAZER,"Mitchell",3)
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Graphic: trainer_HIKER (2)

Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPhoneBattleCount(:TRAILBLAZER,"Mitchell") == 1
 @>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:HIKER)
 @>Text: \bI've been working out, can you tell?
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:TRAILBLAZER,"Mitchell", nil, nil, 1)
  @>Script: pbPhoneIncrement(
  :       : :TRAILBLAZER,"Mitchell", 3
  :       : )
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPhoneBattleCount(:TRAILBLAZER,"Mitchell") >= 1
 @>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:HIKER)
 @>Text: \bAlright alright, lets go! This time you're going down!
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:TRAILBLAZER,"Mitchell", nil, nil, 2)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>Script: pbTrainerEnd
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Freq: 3: Low

List of Event Commands:
@>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
@>Play BGM: 'RivalTheme', 100, 100
@>Show Animation: [rival dummy], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Oh hey!
@>Set Move Route: [rival dummy]
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \xn[Brett]How's your adventure coming along?\n
 :    : You finally got your Soul Badge?
@>Show Animation: [rival dummy], [Happy Emote]
@>Text: \xn[Brett]For once I beat you to the chase!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I need to battle you.\nI've got some new 
 :    : Pokémon I've been training with 
 :    : hard, and I've wanted to battle you for a while now.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I'm really pumped to get my 8th badge 
 :    : and challenge the Pokémon League.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I know I can do it.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Alright so are you ready?
@>Show Animation: [rival dummy], [Thinking Emote]
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Let me heal your Pokémon, so there's no 
 :    : excuses!
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,"Brett",_I("No!"),false,5,true,34)
 @>Show Animation: [rival dummy], [Thinking Emote]
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]...\wt[8] I can't believe I lost...\wt[8] again!
 @>Show Animation: [rival dummy], [Angry Emote]
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]It's these stupid Pokémon, they're all so 
  :    : weak.
 @>Set Move Route: [rival dummy]
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>
: Else
 @>Show Animation: [rival dummy], [Thinking Emote]
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]I won?\nI don't appreciate you taking it easy 
  :    : on me just because I wanted to win.
 @>Show Animation: [rival dummy], [Angry Emote]
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]I'm tired of you thinking you're so much 
  :    : better than me \PN.
 @>Set Move Route: [rival dummy]
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
  :              : $>Move Right
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>
: Branch End
@>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
@>Play BGM: 'soulcity', 100, 100
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(5,"A",true)
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>
